original_title: Pierre Hebert/Bob Ostertag: Between Science and Garbage

Outrageous noise sampling interacts with spontaneously created live animation in this groundbreaking improvisational work, refined and perfected for an exclusive DVD release.
title: Pierre Hebert/Bob Ostertag: Between Science and Garbage
